body_html: patch must be added after msys2 is installed. In the directions for installing MSYS2 here: https://www.tensorflow.org/install/source_windows You can see the instructions to run the following command: pacman -S git patch unzip. Here is a screen grab from my attempt to update msys2: https://s3.amazonaws.com/chris-pub-share/msys2_patch.png HOWEVER, I ran this command nearly 20 minutes ago and I am getting no confirmation that the process is running properly or complete.
